org.hps.recon.filtering

Class V0CandidateFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.filtering.EventReconFilter
        • org.hps.recon.filtering.V0CandidateFilter

  • public class V0CandidateFilter
extends EventReconFilter
    Class to strip off trident candidates. Currently defined as: e+ e- events with tracks; track and vertex chi2 must be better than values defined by cuts, and track times must be within trackDtCut of each other. If the tight constraint is enabled, tracks must be matched to clusters, the Ecal cluster times must be within _timingCut [2.5ns] of each other, and there must be exactly one V0 passing all cuts. Only GBL vertices are considered.

      • setTrackChi2Cut

        public void setTrackChi2Cut(double trackChi2Cut)
        Maximum track chi2 for a V0 to be counted. A V0 is rejected if either of the final state tracks has a chi2 exceeding the cut.
        Parameters:
        trackChi2Cut - default of 20.0.

      • setTrackDtCut

        public void setTrackDtCut(double trackDtCut)
        Maximum track time different for a V0 to be counted.
        Parameters:
        trackDtCut - units of ns, default of 5.0

      • setTrackPMax

        public void setTrackPMax(double trackPMax)
        Maximum track momentum for a V0 to be counted. A V0 is rejected if either of the final state tracks has momentum exceeding this cut.
        Parameters:
        trackPMax - units of GeV, default of 0.9
